00061 class CityDistribution : public Distribution {
00062 private:
00064      double mSigma;
00065      
00067      double mK;
00068 
00069 public:
00070      CityDistribution(const DataObject& d);
00071 
00078      double f(double x) const { return exp(mK * x * x); }
00079 
00080      void update(const Update& u);
00081      void extract(Buffer &b) const;
00082      void reset(const DataObject& d);
00083 };

00092 public:

00144 class NormalDistribution : public Distribution {
00145 private:
00147      double mSigma;
00148      
00150      double mK1;
00151 
00153      double mK2;
00154 
00155 public:
00156      NormalDistribution(double sigma);
00157      NormalDistribution(const DataObject& d);
00158 
00162      virtual ~NormalDistribution() {}
00163 
00170      double f(double x) const { return mK1 * exp(mK2 * x * x); }
00171      void update(const Update& u);
00172      void extract(Buffer &b) const;
00173      void reset(const DataObject& d);
00174 };
